item.title: Physical Backups with Percona Backup for MongoDB
item.description: This session is presented on Percona Community Live Online June 21-23, 2022. Check out the full schedule here. Reduce Recovery Time Objective with new Physical Backups functionality in Percona Backup for MongoDB (PBM). We will explain the value, the limitations of our solution and go deeper into the mechanics of how it works. Check out the full schedule of Percona Community Live Online June 21-23, 2022
